results.overview: Vietnam vet Jon Rubin returns to New York and rents a rundown flat in Greenwich Village. It is in this flat that he begins to film, 'Peeping Tom' style, the people in the apartment across the street. His obsession with making films leads him to fall in with a radical 'Black Power' group, which in turn leads him to carry out a bizarre act of urban terrorism.
results.title: Hi, Mom!

results.overview: I made this film especially for you. I needed to check in with you. I needed to tell you how I feel.
results.title: Hi Stranger

results.overview: An intimate story of the enduring bond of friendship between two hard-living men, set against a sweeping backdrop: the American West, post-World War II, in its twilight. Pete and Big Boy are masters of the prairie, but ultimately face trickier terrain: the human heart.
results.title: The Hi-Lo Country

results.overview: Jimmy needs $900 to clear a gambling debt but a series of lies leads to Ray trying to raise the cash from friends who owe him money.
results.title: Hi-Life

results.overview: Story of a group of drag races and the young boy and girl who join them.
results.title: Hi-Riders

results.overview: A parolee, working for a trucking line, struggles to clear his name after being accused of involvement with hijackers.
results.title: Hi-Jacked

results.overview: When the bride's mother is supposedly swindled out of her money by a spurned suitor, the groom's father orchestrates a scheme of his own to set things right. He is aided by a cabaret singer, while placating a jealous wife.
results.title: Hi Diddle Diddle

results.overview: Cab Calloway plays himself in a plot about jealousy, night clubs, and gangsters. Ends with a series of musical numbers.
results.title: Hi-De-Ho

results.overview: From the makers of "Hi-8", five new tales to blow your mind.
results.title: Hi-Death

results.overview: Ashley travels to Buenos Aires to get FFS (Facial Feminization Surgery). During her last days before going back to Australia she meets Celeste, who would portray Ashley and lend her a handy-cam to make a self-portrait. Bit by bit, the labyrinths of Ashley’s life and the construction of a special link between director and protagonist will be unveiled.
results.title: Hi, Sweety.

results.overview: A celebration of the much-loved holiday camp sitcom, featuring classic scenes and interviews with members of cast and crew including Su Pollard, Ruth Madoc, Jeffrey Holland, Paul Shane and Jimmy Perry. The programme reveals that Butlin's, the real-life inspiration for the series, were not impressed with the show, and there are backstage secrets, such as the day several cast members nearly drowned in the swimming pool
results.title: Hi-De-Hi!: All the Laughs & More

results.overview: Film starring Vyjayanthimala, Dharmendra and Pran
results.title: Pyar Hi Pyar

results.overview: After a gymnastics accident leaves him severely brain-damaged, Blake Hyland is given a platform to bring awareness and hope to everyone he meets on the road to recovery while his family wrestles to restore him back to his former self.
results.title: Hi I'm Blake

results.overview: Managing Editor Brad Bradshaw refuses to run a story linking the disappearance of Frank Canfield with embezzlement of the bank. He considers Frank a straight shooter and he goes easy on the story. Every other paper goes with the story that Frank took the money and Brad is demoted, by the publisher, to the Heartthrob column - writing advice to the lovelorn. After feeling sorry for himself for two months, he takes the column seriously and makes it the talk of the town. But Brad still wants his old job back so he will have to find Canfield and the missing money.
results.title: Hi, Nellie!

results.overview: An usher at a radio station studio pretends to be an executive at the station in order to help a pretty girl become a singer.
results.title: Hi, Good Lookin'!

results.overview: The gay community in the digital age: what happens with a community when it mainly takes form in the internet? How do we interact with each other, if we only meet in the real world to have sex and any communication has shifted to the internet?
results.title: Hi!

results.overview: This movie is cray zay (Crazy)
results.title: Hi.

results.overview: On the banks of a coastal village, a pair of young adult writers, two teen lovers, and mentally ill parents intertwine in three tales of love and forgiveness during separate stages of life.
results.title: Hi.

results.overview: Alanis Obomsawin tells the story of Shannen’s Dream, a national campaign to provide equitable access to education for First Nations children, in safe and suitable schools. She brings together the voices of those who have successfully brought the Dream all the way to the United Nations in Geneva.
results.title: Hi-Ho Mistahey!

results.overview: "With an A.I., you have to keep your sentences short and to the point." - This piece of advice is given to Chuck as he's picking up his new robot partner Harmony fresh from the factory. On the other side of the world, in Tokyo, the cute robot Pepper with Grandma Sakurai, arranged by her son, so that she feels less lonely. But soon, Pepper turns out to be a rather headstrong character. How will we live together with artificial intelligence? What will we win, what will we lose? The documentary shows us tomorrow's world today.
results.title: Hi, A.I.
